questions.answer: The Simlish language is a language invented by Will Wright, from Maxis studio, for the game The Sims. This language was created to be untranslatable gibberish and to mean nothing in order to let it to players' imagination. However, it contains many characters similar to the Latin alphabet, and players and tried to recognize which characters correspond to which letter of the alphabet, and tables of correspondences are available on the internet, dCode then transcribed them in this tool.
